articles.title: Kelsey Fitzsimmons alleges former fiancé broke into her home, stole evidence while she was hospitalized
articles.description:
Fitzsimmons was shot last summer when three other North Andover police officers attempted to serve her a restraining order that was granted to her former fiancé.

The post Kelsey Fitzsimmons alleges former fiancé broke into her home, stole evidence while she was hospitalized appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kelsey Fitzsimmons alleges her former fiancé broke into her home while she was hospitalized.
Fitzsimmons was shot last summer during a police attempt to serve a restraining order.
This incident raises concerns about domestic violence and safety for Boston residents.

articles.title: Drake Maye hosted a free football clinic while vacationing in Hawaii
articles.description:
“I hope you guys can learn something today.”

The post Drake Maye hosted a free football clinic while vacationing in Hawaii appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye hosted a free football clinic for youth while in Hawaii.
Over 100 local kids participated in the clinic on February 25, 2023.
Boston youth gained valuable skills and inspiration from a rising football star.

articles.title: Review & setlist: Conan Gray’s ‘Wishbone’ tour brought a coming-of-age story to TD Garden
articles.description:
The pop star shed his shy persona for a bold, four-act spectacle in Boston, mixing in surprise songs and fan-fueled moments.

The post Review & setlist: Conan Gray’s ‘Wishbone’ tour brought a coming-of-age story to TD Garden appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Conan Gray performed at TD Garden on February 27, showcasing a bold four-act concert.
The show featured surprise songs and interactive moments, engaging Boston fans directly.
Gray's performance contributes to Boston's vibrant music scene, attracting more young audiences.

articles.title: 8 hospitalized for carbon monoxide poisoning on Cape Cod
articles.description:
The incident aboard a boat at MacMillan Pier prompted a mass-casualty response.

The post 8 hospitalized for carbon monoxide poisoning on Cape Cod appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eight individuals were hospitalized for carbon monoxide poisoning on February 27 at MacMillan Pier.
The incident prompted a mass-casualty response from local emergency services.
Boston residents should be aware of potential dangers while boating in enclosed spaces.
